settings.name: Live View Display
settings.description: Sets whether to show images with effects like exposure compensation on screen

settings.name: Emph disp dur shoot
settings.description: Whether to display a frame around the edge of the screen during shooting

settings.name: Shot. Result Preview
settings.description: Automatically shows captured image after shooting

settings.name: Aperture Preview
settings.description: Shows preview of aperture depth of field when button is pressed

settings.name: Shooting Info. Display
settings.description: Sets whether the shooting information display automatically follows orientation changes

settings.name: TC/UB Disp. Setting
settings.description: Sets the display for the time counter and user bits

settings.name: Focus Map
settings.description: Provides a visual indicator of depth that highlights in-focus areas for precise focus

settings.name: Zebra Display
settings.description: Sets zebra pattern to guide exposure

settings.name: Grid Line
settings.description: Sets whether to display the grid line

settings.name: Exposure Set. Guide
settings.description: Sets whether to display a guide when exposure settings are changed
